about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate AI Engineer & Technical Innovator
content: As a Prompt/Generative AI Engineer, I specialize in bridging the gap between cutting-edge AI technology and practical business solutions.
With expertise in lead generation, technical presentations, and POC development, I help organizations leverage AI to drive innovation and growth.
My approach combines deep technical knowledge with strong communication skills, ensuring that complex AI concepts translate into tangible business value.
